Chishia Limestone, Kwanshan, Lungtan, China , Kungurian, Early Permian ( Chen 1958 ); Jurong, China , Kungurian, Early Permian ( Chen & Bao 1986 ); samples 4 (GM5) and 2 (GM6), MKCS 1 section,
